help.title: 1903 Wright Flyer I
help.line: To start, press '~' to turn on ignition and press '}' twice to set magnetos to 2
Engage full throttle. Then press and hold 's' until the engine catches -- it may
Modern analysis shows that The 1903 wright flyer produced enough thrust to
accelerate to 31 mph against a 24 mph wind. It would not have been possible to
accelerate to flying speed without a strong wind down the launch rail.
Lift off speed is 23 mph in ground effect.
